subtitle: Serve with new potatoes and sugar snap peas.

method.text: Melt the butter in a heavy based frying pan with the oil. Add the chicken breasts and saute for 10-15 min, turning frequently until cooked and golden.
Remove the chicken from the pan with a slotted spoon. Keep warm while making the sauce.

Stir the flour into the remaining butter and oil in the pan and cook for 1 min. Gradually whisk in the wine until all is incorporated and bring to a simmer. Cook for 1 min or until thickened. Remove from the heat.
Gradually stir the cream into the sauce with the grapes. Season to taste. Simmer together gently for 1-2 min or until piping hot.
Cut the chicken breasts into thick slices diagonally and arrange on warmed serving plates.
Pour the sauce over the chicken and serve.

title: Amorous chicken with grapes in a seductively creamy wine sauce
